news.image_caption: Another Grid Enhancement Proposal is Live
news.content:
ðŸ—³ Action Requested: Grid Enhancement Proposal


Hi all â€“


There is a new Grid Enhancement Proposal live on the forum focused on default discount level on the grid. For context, please also see this forum post about pricing.


Please take a look and vote after you have an understanding of the topic. If you have any questions, please ask on the forum topic and we will clarify.


Thank you for your participation!
news.excerpt: Take action on the lates Grid Enhancement Proposal focused on default discount level on the grid.

next.title: Calling All Grid 3.0 Testers
